name: The Owlwakening
description:
A short adventure in the forest

*Be an owl

*Scare away pigeons

*Collect strawberries

*Meet the badger

*Maybe there will be cake?

This game is an entry for GameDev.tv Jam 2022.

It was my first game jam and I learned a lot.

A game by Hoot

Coded by Starcat

Ink System by Ink Studios
